mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment ( payment_key, order_id, order_name, amount, method, status, approved_at, is_canceled ) VALUES ( #{paymentKey}, #{orderId}, #{orderName}, #{amount}, #{method}, #{status}, #{approvedAt}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET status = 'CANCELED', is_canceled = 1, cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, canceled_at = #{canceledAt} WHERE payment_key = #{paymentKey}
